summary: Dashboard ecosystem for LuidCorporation with admin panel and client portals
architectural_notes: Two-tier access system: Admin panel at /luid-master-panel and client portals
Network simulation: 5Gbps base with 2.5-4.8Gbps oscillation, 2ms latency for BR-SOUTH
Global announcement system propagating from admin to all client dashboards
Persistence via Local Storage or native Caffeine database
Responsive design for desktop and mobile
Dark theme with neon green (#39FF14) accents
Admin panel includes client management: view registered clients and delete functionality
Client data structure expanded: ID_Luid, client name, password, IP_VPS, User_VPS, Senha_VPS, Plano
Client authentication now requires ID_Luid + password
